title: How is LoL travelling?
body:
It has been a year or so since playing LoL, and I want something "mildly" competitive to play from time-to-time. (Definitely not hardcore Elo-climbing..but still playing ranked every now and then.)

Any **objective** info regarding the game's status/player-base?
Objective info such as; _"Riot has dropped the ball a lot and cares mainly for cash-grabs with skins releases and has avoided crippling game issues for 6 months..". _
Or, _"Man, they have done some great updates and the game is thriving!"_  etc.

Not that I want this to turn into a massive flame-fest because I mention the following game; but I am looking into DOTA 2 as well. I would prefer to play LoL though (if it hasn't been ruined) since I understand the mechanics a lot more and it would be easier to get back into. Also, the faster combat/turn ratios are ideal to me.

Thanks ladies and gents! All the best.
